chinese_sentence_1: 你是哪国人？你的名字真特别！

definition: to feel happy, to rejoice, to have a great time
chinese_sentence_1: 可以跟你一起逛街，真开心！

chinese_sentence_1: 搭地铁比搭出租车便宜，车票只要五十元钱。

definition: once, previously, ever, (past tense marker used before Verb or clause)

english_sentence_2: It’s very dangerous that play the phone and cross the street at the same time.

definition: bustling with noise and excitement, lively

definition: a person's preferences, tastes (in food), flavor

definition: to move (i.e. relocate oneself), to move (something relatively heavy or bulky)

english_sentence_2: If you want to buy a good quality bed, I suggest you should do more research.

definition: to hang or suspend (from a hook etc)
chinese_sentence_1: 你知道那里挂着什么吗?

english_sentence_1: Where do you want to hang the painting? I want to hang the painting here.

english_sentence_2: The chair is broken, take it out.

english_sentence_1: People say that the beef in this restaurant tastes great, that's why so many people are lining up!

definition: way of handling something, method for making, work method, recipe,

pinyin_sentence_1: A: Wǒmen kěyǐ tán yī tán ma? B: Dāngrán!
english_sentence_1: A: Can we talk? B: Of course.
chinese_sentence_2: 我们当然要去美美的生日会啊！
pinyin_sentence_2: Wǒmen dāngrán yào qù Měiměi de shēngrì huì a!
english_sentence_2: We certainly will go Meimei’s birthday party.

chinese_sentence_1: 因为我迷路，所以迟到了。
pinyin_sentence_1: Yīnwèi wǒ mílù, suǒyǐ chídàole.
english_sentence_1: Because I was lost, I was late.
chinese_sentence_2: 他昨天在百货公司里迷路。
pinyin_sentence_2: Tā zuótiān zài bǎihuò gōngsī lǐ mílù.
english_sentence_2: He was lost in the department store yesterday.

definition: to get on or into (a bus, train, car etc)
chinese_sentence_1: 上车吧！我开车带你去公司。
pinyin_sentence_1: Shàng chē ba! Wǒ kāichē dài nǐ qù gōngsī.
english_sentence_1: Get in the car, I will drive you to the office.
chinese_sentence_2: 他上车以后发现坐错车了。
pinyin_sentence_2: Tā shàng chē yǐhòu fāxiàn zuò cuòchēle.
english_sentence_2: He found out that he took a wrong bus only after got on the bus.

chinese_sentence_1: 你喜欢晴天还是雨天呢？
pinyin_sentence_1: Nǐ xǐhuan qíngtiān háishì yǔtiān ne?
english_sentence_1: Do you like sunny or rainy days?
chinese_sentence_2: 今天是晴天，我们一起去走走吧！
pinyin_sentence_2: Jīntiān shì qíngtiān, wǒmen yīqǐ qù zǒu zǒu ba!
english_sentence_2: Today is a sunny day. Let's go for a walk!

definition: there's not enough time (to do something), it's too late (to do something)
chinese_sentence_1: 来不及了，快一点儿，要迟到了。
pinyin_sentence_1: Láibujíle, kuài yìdiǎnr, yào chídào le.
english_sentence_1: It is too late. Hurry up. We are going to be late.
chinese_sentence_2: 上班来不及了，快上车。
pinyin_sentence_2: Shàngbān láibujíle, kuài shàng chē.
english_sentence_2: It’s almost late for work, get on the car quickly.

chinese_sentence_1: 煮火锅的方法不难。先把火打开，再把蔬菜、肉放进去锅子里，然后等一会儿就可以吃了。
pinyin_sentence_1: Zhǔ huǒguō de fāngfǎ bù nán. Xiān bǎ huǒ dǎkāi, zài bǎ shūcài, ròu fàng jìnqù guōzi lǐ, ránhòu děng yìhuǐr jiù kěyǐ chī le.
english_sentence_1: It is not difficult to make hotpot. First, turn on the stove, then put vegetables and meats in the pot. After waiting for a while, you can eat it.
chinese_sentence_2: 我喜欢先喝汽水跟汤，然后再吃饭。
pinyin_sentence_2: Wǒ xǐhuan xiān hē qìshuǐ gēn tāng, ránhòu zài chīfàn.
english_sentence_2: I like to first drink soft drinks and soup, and then eat.

chinese_sentence_1: 我们赶快走吧！要下雨了。
pinyin_sentence_1: Wǒmen gǎnkuài zǒu ba! Yào xià yǔle.
english_sentence_1: Let's go! It is going to rain soon.
chinese_sentence_2: 你看！公共汽车来了，赶快跑。
pinyin_sentence_2: Nǐ kàn! Gōnggòng qìchē lái le, gǎnkuài pǎo.
english_sentence_2: Look! The bus is coming, run quickly.

definition: to get off or out of (a bus, train, car etc)
chinese_sentence_1: 你下车以后，往右拐。医院就在那儿。
pinyin_sentence_1: Nǐ xiàchē yǐhòu, wǎng yòu guǎi. Yīyuàn jiù zài nà'er.
english_sentence_1: After you get off the bus, turn right. The hospital is right there.
chinese_sentence_2: 赶快下车，大家都在等你呢！
pinyin_sentence_2: Gǎnkuài xià chē, dàjiā dōu zài děng nǐ ne!
english_sentence_2: Get off quickly. Everyone is waiting for you!

chinese_sentence_1: 这件事很急，我今天一定要做完。
pinyin_sentence_1: Zhè jiàn shì hěn jí, wǒ jīntiān yídìng yào zuò wán.
english_sentence_1: This is urgent, I have to finish it today.
chinese_sentence_2: 今天早上太晚起床，急得把衣服穿错了
pinyin_sentence_2: Jīntiān zǎoshang tài wǎn qǐchuáng, jí de bǎ yīfu chuān cuòle.
english_sentence_2: I woke up too late today, I wore wrong clothes because i was in the hurry.

definition: to do, to manage, to handle, to play with, to fool with, to mess with, to fix, to toy with
chinese_sentence_1: 妈妈弄了一碗面。
pinyin_sentence_1: Māmā nòngle yī wǎn miàn.
english_sentence_1: Mom made a bowl of noodles.
chinese_sentence_2: 她把画弄坏了。
pinyin_sentence_2: Tā bǎ huà nòng huài le.
english_sentence_2: She broke the painting.

definition: bad, spoiled, broken, to break down
chinese_sentence_1: 他把东西弄坏了，妈妈很生气。
pinyin_sentence_1: Tā bǎ dōngxi nòng huài le, māma hěn shēngqì.
english_sentence_1: He broke something, Mom is very angry.
chinese_sentence_2: 这台电脑坏了，已经不能用了。
pinyin_sentence_2: Zhè tái diànnǎo huài le, yǐjīng bùnéng yòng le.
english_sentence_2: This computer is broken. It can not work any more.

chinese_sentence_1: 他看起来很生气，发生什么事了？
pinyin_sentence_1: Tā kàn qǐlái hěn shēngqì, fāshēng shénme shì le?
english_sentence_1: He looks very angry. What happened?
chinese_sentence_2: 东西坏了，他很生气。
pinyin_sentence_2: Dōngxi huài le, tā hěn shēngqì.
english_sentence_2: Something is broken, he is very angry.

chinese_sentence_1: 我不小心把东西打破了。
pinyin_sentence_1: Wǒ bù xiǎoxīn bǎ dōngxi dǎpò le.
english_sentence_1: I accidentally broke something.
chinese_sentence_2: 他不小心弄坏了椅子，妈妈很生气。
pinyin_sentence_2: Tā bù xiǎoxīn nòng huài le yǐzi,māma hěn shēngqì.
english_sentence_2: He accidentally broke the chair. His mother was super angry.

chinese_sentence_1: 我昨天刚搬家，现在想去二手商店买一些东西。
pinyin_sentence_1: Wǒ zuótiān gāng bānjiā, xiànzài xiǎng qù èrshǒu shāngdiàn mǎi yīxiē dōngxi.
english_sentence_1: I just moved yesterday, and now want to go to the second-hand shop to buy something.
chinese_sentence_2: 谢谢你帮我搬家，我请你吃东西吧！
pinyin_sentence_2: Xièxiè nǐ bāng wǒ bānjiā, wǒ qǐng nǐ chī dōngxi ba!
english_sentence_2: Thank you for helping me move. Let me treat you to a meal!

definition: to treat, to invite to dinner
chinese_sentence_1: 今天我请客，你想吃什么呢？
pinyin_sentence_1: Jīntiān wǒ qǐngkè, nǐ xiǎng chī shénme ne?
english_sentence_1: Today is my treat, what do you want to eat?
chinese_sentence_2: 他昨天请客吗？你们去哪间餐厅吃呢？
pinyin_sentence_2: Tā zuótiān qǐngkè ma? Nǐmen qù nǎ jiān cāntīng chī ne?
english_sentence_2: Did he treat yesterday? Which restaurant did you go to?

chinese_sentence_1: 把房间整理好，就可以吃晚餐。
pinyin_sentence_1: Bǎ fángjiān zhěnglǐ hǎo, jiù kěyǐ chī wǎncān.
english_sentence_1: After tidying up the room, you can eat dinner.
chinese_sentence_2: 你赶快整理东西，妈妈要回家了。

english_sentence_2: Quickly tidy up your room, Mom is coming back home.

chinese_sentence_1: 他喜欢扫地和整理房间。
pinyin_sentence_1: Tā xǐhuan sǎodì hé zhěnglǐ fángjiān.
english_sentence_1: He likes to sweep and clean the room.
chinese_sentence_2: 弟弟每个星期都帮妈妈扫地。
pinyin_sentence_2: Dìdi měi ge xīngqī dōu bāng māma sǎodì.
english_sentence_2: My younger brother helps mother sweeping floor every week.

chinese_sentence_1: 他把我最喜欢的杯子打破了。
pinyin_sentence_1: Tā bǎ wǒ zuì xǐhuan de bēizi dǎpò le.
english_sentence_1: My favorite mug was broken by him.
chinese_sentence_2: 整理房间的时候，他不小心打破了东西。
pinyin_sentence_2: Zhěnglǐ fángjiān de shíhou, tā bù xiǎoxīn dǎpòle dōngxi.
english_sentence_2: When cleaning the room, he accidentally broke something.

chinese_sentence_1: 我的手机丢了，我好难过。
pinyin_sentence_1: Wǒ de shǒujī diū le, wǒ hǎo nánguò.
english_sentence_1: My cell phone is lost, I am so sad.
chinese_sentence_2: 他怕丢钱。
pinyin_sentence_2: Tā pà diū qián.
english_sentence_2: He is afraid of losing his money.

definition: to have an accident, to meet with a mishap
chinese_sentence_1: 出事了，快打电话回家。
pinyin_sentence_1: Chūshì le, kuài dǎdiànhuà huí jiā.
english_sentence_1: Something happened! Call home!
chinese_sentence_2: 为什么都不接电话，是不是出事了？
pinyin_sentence_2: Wèishénme dōu bù jiē diànhuà, shì búshì chūshì le?
english_sentence_2: Why did you all not pick up the phone? Did something happen?

chinese_sentence_1: 真奇怪，今天他没有来上班。
pinyin_sentence_1: Zhēn qíguài, jīntiān tā méiyǒu lái shàngbān.
english_sentence_1: Really strange, today he did not come to work.
chinese_sentence_2: 今天的天气很奇怪，刚是雨天，现在是晴天。

english_sentence_2: The weather today is weird, It was just raining, and now is sunny day.

chinese_sentence_1: 你真糊涂，手机不是在你的包包里吗？
pinyin_sentence_1: Nǐ zhēn hútú, shǒujī bùshì zài nǐ de bāo bāo lǐ ma?
english_sentence_1: You're so confused, isn't your phone in your bag?
chinese_sentence_2: 我的弟弟很糊涂，常忘了带钱包出门。
pinyin_sentence_2: Wǒ de dìdì hěn hútú, cháng wàngle dài qiánbāo chūmén.

definition: to have disappeared, to be missing
chinese_sentence_1: 我的手机不见了，快帮我找一找。

chinese_sentence_2: 我买的鱼怎么不见了？
pinyin_sentence_2: Wǒ mǎi de yú zěnme bùjiàn le?
english_sentence_2: Where's the fish I bought?

definition: to feel sad, to feel unwell
chinese_sentence_1: 我最喜欢的杯子被打破了，我很难过。
pinyin_sentence_1: Wǒ zuì xǐhuan de bēizi bèi dǎpòle, wǒ hěn nánguò.
english_sentence_1: My favorite cup was broken, so I was very sad.
chinese_sentence_2: 我的手机不见了，所以我很难过。
pinyin_sentence_2: Wǒ de shǒujī bùjiànle, suǒyǐ wǒ hěn nánguò.
english_sentence_2: My cellphone is missing, so I am sad.

chinese_sentence_1: 好在你找到了手机，没有手机真不方便。

pinyin_sentence_2: Hǎo zài wǒ jīntiān méi chūmén, wàimiàn xiànzài xià dàyǔ.

chinese_sentence_1: 别急！时间还没到呢！你可以慢慢来。

chinese_sentence_2: 别急，你的汉语会慢慢进步的。
pinyin_sentence_2: Bié jí, nǐ de hànyǔ huì màn man jìnbù de.
english_sentence_2: Don’t worry, your Chinese will improve gradually.

chinese_sentence_1: 我看到小偷跑了，快打电话给警察。

english_sentence_2: My things are all stolen by thief yesterday.

chinese_sentence_1: 我家的电视让小偷给偷了。
pinyin_sentence_1: Wǒjiā de diànshì ràng xiǎotōu gěi tōule.
english_sentence_1: The thief stole my TV.
chinese_sentence_2: 我放在桌上的电脑被偷了。
pinyin_sentence_2: Wǒ fàng zài zhuō shàng de diànnǎo bèi tōule.
english_sentence_2: The computer I placed on the table was stolen.

definition: to put on or wear (glasses, hat, gloves etc)
chinese_sentence_1: 那个人戴着红色的帽子，走得很快，太奇怪了。
pinyin_sentence_1: Nà gèrén dàizhe hóngsè de màozi, zǒu de hěn kuài, tài qíguài le.
english_sentence_1: The man, who wore a red hat, walked very quickly. It was so strange.

pinyin_sentence_2: Rúguǒ bú dài yǎnjìng, wǒ kàn bú dào lǎoshī xiě zài hēibǎn de zì.

definition: to carry on the back or shoulder
chinese_sentence_1: 我背了太多东西，好重，你可以帮我吗？

chinese_sentence_1: 这是我最喜欢的帽子，是我妈妈送给我的。

english_sentence_1: This is my favorite hat. My mother gave me this hat.
chinese_sentence_2: 我每天都戴着帽子去上课。
pinyin_sentence_2: Wǒ měitiān dōu dàizhe màozi qù shàngkè.
english_sentence_2: I wear hat to class every day.

chinese_sentence_1: 这副眼镜，很漂亮，我很喜欢。
pinyin_sentence_1: Zhè fù yǎnjìng, hěn piàoliang, wǒ hěn xǐhuan.
english_sentence_1: This glasses is beautiful. I like it so much.
chinese_sentence_2: 放在洗手间的眼镜是谁的？
pinyin_sentence_2: Fàng zài xǐshǒujiān de yǎnjìng shì shéi de?
english_sentence_2: Whose are the glasses left in the restroom?

chinese_sentence_1: 这个背包是爸爸送给我的，我已经用了五年了。
pinyin_sentence_1: Zhège bēibāo shì bàba sòng gěi wǒ de, wǒ yǐjīng yòng le wǔ nián le.
english_sentence_1: My father presented this backpack for me. I've already used for five years.
chinese_sentence_2: 这个背包很大，能装很多东西。
pinyin_sentence_2: Zhège bēibāo hěn dà, néng zhuāng hěnduō dōngxi.
english_sentence_2: This bag is really big, you can put a lot of things in it.

chinese_sentence_1: 明天你陪我去百货公司买鞋吧！
pinyin_sentence_1: Míngtiān nǐ péi wǒ qù bǎihuò gōngsī mǎi xié ba!
english_sentence_1: Tomorrow accompany me to the department store to buy shoes!
chinese_sentence_2: 穿这双鞋去公司不太合适。
pinyin_sentence_2: Chuān zhè shuāng xié qù gōngsī bù tài héshì.
english_sentence_2: It’s not appropriate to wearing this shoes to the office.

chinese_sentence_1: 这件衬衫我在百货公司买的。
pinyin_sentence_1: Zhè jiàn chènshān wǒ zài bǎihuò gōngsī mǎi de.
english_sentence_1: This shirt I bought in the department store.
chinese_sentence_2: 我真糊涂，今天穿错衬衫去公司。
pinyin_sentence_2: Wǒ zhēn hútú, jīntiān chuān cuò chènshān qù gōngsī.
english_sentence_2: How silly I am. I wore the wrong shirts to the office.

chinese_sentence_1: 这件裤子被他弄破了，妈妈很生气。
pinyin_sentence_1: Zhè jiàn kùzi bèi tā nòng pòle, māmā hěn shēngqì.
english_sentence_1: This pants were broken by him, so my mother was very angry.
chinese_sentence_2: 我昨天整理房间的时候，发现小时候穿过的裤子。
pinyin_sentence_2: Wǒ zuótiān zhěnglǐ fángjiān de shíhou, fāxiàn xiǎoshíhou chuānguò de kùzi.
english_sentence_2: When I cleaned the room yesterday, I found the pants I had worn when I was little.

chinese_sentence_1: 这里有好多鞋子，你喜欢哪一双鞋呢？
pinyin_sentence_1: Zhèlǐ yǒu hǎoduō xiézi, nǐ xǐhuan nǎ yī shuāng xié ne?
english_sentence_1: There are a lot of shoes here, which pair of shoes do you like?
chinese_sentence_2: 这双筷子是我在北京买的。
pinyin_sentence_2: Zhè shuāng kuàizi shì wǒ zài běijīng mǎi de.
english_sentence_2: I bought this pair of chopsticks in Beijing.

chinese_sentence_1: 公共汽车要来了，快跑，上班来不及了。
pinyin_sentence_1: Gōnggòng qìchē yào láile, kuài pǎo, shàngbān láibují le.
english_sentence_1: Bus is coming, we’re going to be late, run faster!
chinese_sentence_2: 晴天的时候，我喜欢到我家附近的公园跑一跑。
pinyin_sentence_2: Qíngtiān de shíhou, wǒ xǐhuan dào wǒjiā fùjìn de gōngyuán pǎo yī pǎo.
english_sentence_2: In sunny day, I like to go running in the park where near my home.

chinese_sentence_1: 我迷路了，好在有警察的帮忙。
pinyin_sentence_1: Wǒ mílùle, hǎo zài yǒu jǐngchá de bāngmáng.
english_sentence_1: I was lost, but fortunately, a police helped me.
chinese_sentence_2: 警察先生，请问这附近的历史博物馆在哪儿？
pinyin_sentence_2: Jǐngchá xiānshēng, qǐngwèn zhè fùjìn de lìshǐ bówùguǎn zài nǎ'er?
english_sentence_2: Police officer, May I ask where the nearby history museum is?

chinese_sentence_1: 原来今天是他的生日，怪不得他这么开心。
pinyin_sentence_1: Yuánlái jīntiān shì tā de shēngrì, guàibùdé tā zhème kāixīn.
english_sentence_1: It is his birthday today. No wonder he is so happy.
chinese_sentence_2: 我昨天喝酒喝太多，怪不得今天早上头痛。
pinyin_sentence_2: Wǒ zuótiān hējiǔ hē tài duō, guàibùdé jīntiān zǎoshang tóutòng.
english_sentence_2: I drank too much yesterday, no wonder I have headache this morning.

chinese_sentence_1: 我昨天十二点左右才睡。
pinyin_sentence_1: Wǒ zuótiān shí'èr diǎn zuǒyòu cái shuì.
english_sentence_1: I slept at about twelve o'clock yesterday.
chinese_sentence_2: 我学了三个月左右的汉语。
pinyin_sentence_2: Wǒ xuéle sān gè yuè zuǒyòu de hànyǔ.

pinyin_sentence_1: Jīntiān wǎnshàng shì zúqiú bǐsài, nǐ yào yīqǐ kàn ma?

chinese_sentence_2: 我每天去学校都会经过一家很漂亮的咖啡店。

english_sentence_2: I pass a beautiful coffee shop every day on the way to school.

chinese_sentence_1: 这张桌子是圆的，我很喜欢。

definition: to place an order, to book ahead

definition: Measure word for families or businesses,
chinese_sentence_1: 这家餐厅的蛋糕很好吃。

definition: (used after a verb) in a while, give it a try

english_sentence_1: She isn't taller than me.
chinese_sentence_2: 你的家人都比你高吗？
pinyin_sentence_2: Nǐ de jiārén dōu bǐ nǐ gāo ma?
english_sentence_2: Is your family all taller than you?

chinese_sentence_1: 吃饭前先洗手。
pinyin_sentence_1: Chīfàn qián xiān xǐshǒu.
english_sentence_1: Wash your hands before eating.
chinese_sentence_2: 洗完菜以后，下一步就是准备放到锅子里炒了。
pinyin_sentence_2: Xǐ wán cài yǐhòu, xìa yí bù jiùshì zhǔnbèi fàng dào guōzi lǐ chǎo le.
english_sentence_2: After washing the vegetable, the next step is to cook it in the pan.

chinese_sentence_1: 我的酒店旁边有火车站。
pinyin_sentence_1: Wǒ de jiǔdiàn pángbiān yǒu huǒchēzhàn.
english_sentence_1: There is a train station next to my hotel.
chinese_sentence_2: 这间房子在火车站附近，所以很吵。
pinyin_sentence_2: Zhèjiān fángzi zài huǒchēzhàn fùjìn, suǒyǐ hěnchǎo.
english_sentence_2: The house is near the train station, so it is noisy.

definition: to play, to have fun, to hang out
chinese_sentence_1: 我们常常一起去公园玩。
pinyin_sentence_1: Wǒmen chángcháng yīqǐ qù gōngyuán wán.
english_sentence_1: We often go to the park to hang out together.
chinese_sentence_2: 我觉得做饭很好玩儿。
pinyin_sentence_2: Wǒ juéde zuòfàn hěn hǎowánēr.
english_sentence_2: I think cooking is fun.

chinese_sentence_1: 请问男厕在哪儿？
pinyin_sentence_1: Qǐngwèn nán cè zài nǎ'er?
english_sentence_1: Where is the male restroom?
chinese_sentence_2: 我的男朋友现在在国外工作，我非常想他。
pinyin_sentence_2: Wǒ de nánpéngyou xiànzài zài guówài gōngzuò, wǒ fēicháng xiǎng tā.
english_sentence_2: My boyfriend is working abroad, I miss him so much.

chinese_sentence_1: 今天我哥哥背着昨天买的新背包。
pinyin_sentence_1: Jīntiān wǒ gēgē bèizhe zuótiān mǎi de xīn bēibāo.
english_sentence_1: My brother is carrying the bag which he bought yesterday.
chinese_sentence_2: 你知道那里挂着什么吗?
pinyin_sentence_2: Nǐ zhīdào nàlǐ guàzhe shénme ma?
english_sentence_2: Do you know what is hanging there?

chinese_sentence_1: 我有两张电影票。
pinyin_sentence_1: Wǒ yǒu liǎng zhāng diànyǐng piào.
english_sentence_1: I have two movie tickets.
chinese_sentence_2: 中国的车票很便宜。
pinyin_sentence_2: Zhōngguó de chēpiào hěn piányi.
english_sentence_2: Train tickets in China are very cheap.

chinese_sentence_1: 地铁站离学校三百公尺。
pinyin_sentence_1: Dìtiě zhàn lí xuéxiào sānbǎi gōng chǐ.
english_sentence_1: The subway station is 300 meters from the school.
chinese_sentence_2: 离我家最远的商店要走一小时。
pinyin_sentence_2: Lí wǒ jiā zuì yuǎn de shāngdiàn yào zǒu yì xiǎoshí.
english_sentence_2: The most far away shop from my house take an hour by walking.

chinese_sentence_1: 穿红色衣服的人是我哥哥。
pinyin_sentence_1: Chuān hóngsè yīfú de rén shì wǒ gēgē.
english_sentence_1: The one wearing red is my older brother.
chinese_sentence_2: 这件毛衣你穿起来一定很好看。
pinyin_sentence_2: Zhè jiàn máoyī nǐ chuān qǐlái yídìng hěn hǎokàn.
english_sentence_2: This sweater you wear it must look good.

chinese_sentence_1: 小志每天都第一个到办公室的人。
pinyin_sentence_1: Xiǎo zhì měitiān dū dì yī gè dào bàngōngshì de rén.
english_sentence_1: Xiao Zhi is the first person to the office every day.
chinese_sentence_2: 这是我的父母，他们第一次来这间餐厅。
pinyin_sentence_2: Zhè shì wǒ de fùmǔ, tāmen dì yī cì lái zhè jiān cāntīng.
english_sentence_2: They are my parents, it is their first time to come to this restaurant.

chinese_sentence_1: 红色的杯子不是小锦的。
pinyin_sentence_1: Hóngsè de bēizi bùshì Xiǎo Jǐn de.
english_sentence_1: The red cup is not Xiao Jin's.
chinese_sentence_2: 那位戴红色的帽子的男生是我的弟弟。
pinyin_sentence_2: Nà wèi dài hóngsè de màozi de nánshēng shì wǒ de dìdi.
english_sentence_2: That man who is wearing a red hat is my younger brother.

chinese_sentence_1: 她的男朋友虽然胖，但是比你高得多了！
pinyin_sentence_1: Tā de nánpéngyou suīrán pàng, dànshì bǐ nǐ gāo de duō le!
english_sentence_1: Although her boyfriend is fat, he is much taller than you!
chinese_sentence_2: 虽然他住在北京这么久了，但是还是会迷路。
pinyin_sentence_2: Suīrán tā zhù zài Běijīng zhème jiǔ le, dànshì háishì huì mílù.
english_sentence_2: Although he lives in Beijing for a long time, but he still gets lost .

chinese_sentence_1: 我要去买西瓜汁，你去不去？
pinyin_sentence_1: Wǒ yào qù mǎi xīguā zhī, nǐ qù bù qù?
english_sentence_1: I'm going to buy watermelon juice, do you wanna go?

chinese_sentence_1: 他常常忘东忘西，让妈妈很生气。
pinyin_sentence_1: Tā chángcháng wàng dōng wàng xī , ràng māma hěn shēngqì.
english_sentence_1: He often forgets things, making his mother angry.
chinese_sentence_2: 这个工作不轻松,让我从早忙到晚。
pinyin_sentence_2: Zhège gōngzuò bù qīngsōng, ràng wǒ cóng zǎo máng dào wǎn .
english_sentence_2: This job is not easy, it has me busy from morning to evening.

chinese_sentence_1: 这件衣服都很贵，但是质量很好。
pinyin_sentence_1: Zhè jiàn yīfú dōu hěn guì, dànshì zhìliàng hěn hǎo.
english_sentence_1: This piece of clothing is expensive, but the quality is great.
chinese_sentence_2: 这个东西真贵。
pinyin_sentence_2: Zhège dōngxi zhēn guì.
english_sentence_2: This thing is really expensive.

chinese_sentence_1: 我每天跑步六十分钟。
pinyin_sentence_1: Wǒ měitiān pǎobù liùshí fēnzhōng.
english_sentence_1: I run for sixty minutes a day.
chinese_sentence_2: 你跑步时听音乐吗？
pinyin_sentence_2: Nǐ pǎobù shí tīng yīnyuè ma?
english_sentence_2: Do you listen to music when you go jogging?

chinese_sentence_1: 他不会踢足球，但是喜欢看足球比赛。
pinyin_sentence_1: Tā bù huì tīzúqiú, dànshì xǐhuān kàn zúqiú bǐsài.
english_sentence_1: He doesn't play soccer, but likes to watch soccer matches.
chinese_sentence_2: 他踢足球的技术进步多了，跟三年前完全不一样。
pinyin_sentence_2: Tā tīzúqiú de jìshù jìnbù duō le ，gēn sān nián qián wánquán bù yíyàng.
english_sentence_2: He plays football with much better technique, unlike three years ago.

chinese_sentence_1: 这件裤子还有别的颜色吗？
pinyin_sentence_1: Zhè jiàn kù zǐ hái yǒu bié de yánsè ma?
english_sentence_1: Do you have this pair of pants in other colors?
chinese_sentence_2: 你想住在山上还是海边？
pinyin_sentence_2: Nǐ xiǎng zhù zài shānshàng háishì hǎibiān?
english_sentence_2: Do you want to live in the mountains or along the seaside?

chinese_sentence_1: 请进，请坐。
pinyin_sentence_1: Qǐng jìn, qǐng zuò.
english_sentence_1: Come in, have a seat.
chinese_sentence_2: 我的房东常常自己开门进来，我该怎么办？
pinyin_sentence_2: Wǒ de fángdōng chángcháng zìjǐ kāimén jìnlái, wǒ gāi zěnmebàn?
english_sentence_2: My landlord often opens my door and gets in my room, what can I do?

chinese_sentence_1: 可以借我一支铅笔吗？
pinyin_sentence_1: Kěyǐ jiè wǒ yī zhī qiānbǐ ma?
english_sentence_1: Can I borrow a pencil?

definition: wrong, to wrong, to err, error, mistake
chinese_sentence_1: 这个字我写错了。
pinyin_sentence_1: Zhège zì wǒ xiě cuòle.
english_sentence_1: I wrote this character incorrectly.
chinese_sentence_2: 我写错他家的地址了，所以他没有收到信。
pinyin_sentence_2: Wǒ xiě cuò tā jiā de dìzhǐ le, suǒyǐ tā méiyǒu shōudào xìn.
english_sentence_2: I wrote the address of his home wrong, so he did not receive the letter.

chinese_sentence_1: 清关门，谢谢。
pinyin_sentence_1: Qīng guānmén, xièxiè.
english_sentence_1: Please shut the door, thank you.
chinese_sentence_2: 门外有一只狗。
pinyin_sentence_2: Mén wài yǒu yī zhī gǒu.
english_sentence_2: There is a dog outside the door.

chinese_sentence_1: 有没有问题？
pinyin_sentence_1: Yǒu méiyǒu wèntí?
english_sentence_1: Any questions?
chinese_sentence_2: 你去服务台问一问，有没有人看见你的钱包。
pinyin_sentence_2: Nǐ qù fúwùtái wèn yí wèn, yǒu méiyǒu rén kànjiàn nǐ de qiánbāo.
english_sentence_2: You go to the desk to ask to see if anyone has seen your wallet.

chinese_sentence_1: 这个星期每天都是阴天。
pinyin_sentence_1: Zhège xīngqī měitiān dū shì yīn tiān.
english_sentence_1: This week is cloudy every day.
chinese_sentence_2: 明天不会下雨，是阴天。
pinyin_sentence_2: Míngtiān bú huì xià yǔ, shì yīn tiān.
english_sentence_2: It won’t rain tomorrow, it will be a cloudy day.

chinese_sentence_1: 你看，下雪了。
pinyin_sentence_1: Nǐ kàn, xiàxuě le.
english_sentence_1: You see, it's snowing。
chinese_sentence_2: 外面下雪了，真漂亮。
pinyin_sentence_2: Wàimiàn xiàxuě le, zhēn piàoliang.
english_sentence_2: It’s snowing outside, it’s very pretty.

chinese_sentence_1: 今年是二零一七年。
pinyin_sentence_1: Jīnnián shì èr líng yīqī nián.
english_sentence_1: This year it is 2017.
chinese_sentence_2: 谁能想到他二零一一年的时候竟然意外死亡了。
pinyin_sentence_2: Shéi néng xiǎngdào tā èr líng yīyī nián de shíhòu jìngrán yìwài sǐwángle.
english_sentence_2: Who would've thought that in two thousand and eleven he would accidentally die?

chinese_sentence_1: 面条是我们的主食。
pinyin_sentence_1: Miàntiáo shì wǒmen de zhǔshí.
english_sentence_1: Noodles are one of our staple foods.
chinese_sentence_2: 我在中国上学的时候，特别喜欢吃面条。
pinyin_sentence_2: Wǒ zài Zhōngguó shàngxué de shíhou, tèbié xǐhuan chī miàntiáo.
english_sentence_2: When I studied in China, I really enjoyed eating noodles.

chinese_sentence_1: 我喜欢这件黑色的衣服。
pinyin_sentence_1: Wǒ xǐhuān zhè jiàn hēisè de yīfú.
english_sentence_1: I like this black dress.
chinese_sentence_2: 这个电影是黑色幽默类型的电影。
pinyin_sentence_2: Zhège diànyǐng shì hēisè yōumò lèixíng de diànyǐng.
english_sentence_2: This movie is a dark comedy type.
